price: Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni àwọn tí iṣẹ́ wọn ti bàjẹ́ ní ilé ayé àti ní ọ̀run. Wọn kò sì níí rí àwọn olùrànlọ́wọ́.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
